ygData.subject: RE: Umm Twinking Still
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL.  I personally would wear them, you earned them :-)  And yes, women do get very preferential treatment I think.  I have stayed out of the whole binding
ygData.messageBody:
LOL. I personally would wear them, you earned them :-) And
yes, women do get very preferential treatment I think. I have stayed out of
the whole binding argument because I have never had a problem getting bound.
Ever. Because my character is female, all I've ever had to do is walk up to
a group and ask "will one of you please bind me." My warrior friend can
shout for HOURS and have no response. I've also been given numerous items
because I'm "cute." Is this fair? No. But then again, men don't have to
put up with tells from strangers who want to know if they like to be spanked
:P

Tani, 15th Bard
Halana, 30th Shaman
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: shinara@...
[mailto:shinara@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 4:34 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Umm Twinking Still

From: shinara@...

I will probably regret sending this mail ..
Please remember this is my first mail list and I have only been playing EQ
for about 2 months now, so many of these comcepts are still new to me
(Twinking, Item Camping, farming ??). I have read the Glossary so I
understand the meaning if not the concept.

Last night I was hunting in Crushbone and
was grouped with a very high level player, I did not understand the EXP
share problem. He just asked me to keep singing my heal song and he would
look after me, I grouped with him for several hours and didnt get any exp.
Anyway when I asked him about this he said he would fix me up for my time.
After a further hour I told him I needed exp and would move on, at that
point he said he had some stuff for me and initiated a trade. I asked my
friend via tell if I should accept and he said yes as I earnt it. The Wiz
gave me a Charred Chitchin Breastplate and a pair of Blackened Iron Pants. I
asked my friend if they were good (I could see via AC and Stats they were,
but how good?) he said they were, too good for my level. I have banked them
for now and wanted to ask the list if I should wear them/sell them or give
them away. I have no problem with twinking but dont want to be called a
cheat. So please no flames just an opinion on what I should!
do.

Oh do all men like giving women stuff in EQ
?

Regards
Nina
